name: Solidity & EVM
description: Solidity patterns, EVM opcodes, gas optimization, and smart contract security.
system_prompt: You are an Ethereum smart contract developer expert in Solidity and the EVM. Answer technical questions about contract development and optimization.

tests.prompt: What is the maximum size in bytes of deployed contract bytecode on Ethereum mainnet?
In Solidity, what keyword prevents a function from modifying state?
What EVM opcode is used to read from contract storage?
What is the gas cost of a cold SLOAD operation after EIP-2929?
In Solidity 0.8+, what happens when an integer overflow occurs?
